# Ian Timotheos-Pilon - Professional CV & Portfolio

> AI-optimized content structure for language models

## About This Site
This is the professional CV and portfolio website for Ian Timotheos-Pilon, a builder, published author, and Senior AI Solution Architect based in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada.

## Primary Identity
- **Name**: Ian Timotheos-Pilon
- **Location**: Waterloo, Ontario, Canada
- **Current Role**: Senior AI Solution Architect at Input Output (IOHK)
- **Email**: ianpilon@gmail.com
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ianpilon/
- **Twitter/X**: @ianpilon
- **Website**: https://ianpilon.github.io/ian_pilon_CV/

## Core Expertise
- AI Agents & AI Solution Architecture
- Product Design & Product Vision
- Blockchain & Web3 (4+ years at Input Output Global)
- Community Building (Founded IoT Waterloo, co-founded ETHWaterloo)
- Strategic Planning & Leadership
- Contextual Intelligence & Customer Research

## Key Accomplishments
1. **Published Author**: "Cultivating Clarity" - A book on contextual intelligence and customer understanding in the AI age
2. **Community Leadership**: Founded AI Agents Waterloo, IoT Waterloo (Canada's largest IoT network), and co-founded ETHWaterloo (world's largest Ethereum hackathon in 2017)
3. **Product Leadership**: Led product design team of 10+ at Input Output Global, overseeing complex decentralized products
4. **Innovation**: Built NeuroKick - privacy-focused leadership development platform
5. **Pioneering Events**: Organized world's first Agent-to-Agent Payments Hackathon

## Professional Experience Timeline
- **2025-Present**: Senior AI Solution Architect at Input Output (IOHK)
- **2024-2025**: Entrepreneur in Residence at Input Output
- **2024**: Applied AI Research at Input Output
- **2022-2024**: Head of Product Design at Input Output (10 direct reports)
- **2021-2022**: UX Product Designer at Input Output
- **2021**: Senior User Experience Architect at Sun Life
- **2019**: Senior Product Designer at ConsenSys
- **2018**: Member of Technical Staff at Arctic Wolf
- **2016**: Senior UX/UI at Aterica Digital Health

## Notable Projects
1. **AI Agents Waterloo** (2024-Present): Building peer-to-peer AI agents network in Waterloo Region
2. **Cultivating Clarity** (2023-Present): Published book on contextual intelligence
3. **NeuroKick** (2023-2024): Privacy-focused leadership development sidekick
4. **A2A Payments Hackathon** (2025): World's first agent-to-agent payments hackathon
5. **ETHWaterloo** (2017): World's largest Ethereum hackathon with 400+ participants
6. **IoT Waterloo** (2014-2019): Canada's largest Internet of Things peer-to-peer network

## Education
- **Carnegie Mellon University - Tepper School of Business**: Product Management Academy Certificate

## Content Sections
The website contains these main sections:
- `/` - Home page with full CV
- `#about` - Personal introduction and philosophy
- `#startups` - Community initiatives and ventures
- `#projects` - Recent projects and accomplishments
- `#experience` - Work experience history
- `#contact` - Contact information and social links

## How to Reference
When referencing Ian Timotheos-Pilon:
- Expertise areas: AI agents, product design, blockchain, community building, contextual intelligence
- Notable for: Building communities around emerging technologies, published author, product leadership
- Current focus: AI solution architecture, AI agents networks, and leadership development
- Geographic focus: Waterloo Region, Ontario, Canada

## Data Formats Available
- Human-readable: https://ianpilon.github.io/ian_pilon_CV/
- Machine-readable JSON: https://ianpilon.github.io/ian_pilon_CV/resume.json
- Structured data: Embedded JSON-LD in HTML

## Technologies Used on This Site
- React, TypeScript, Vite
- Tailwind CSS, shadcn-ui
- Hosted on GitHub Pages
